meta.title: From MACY'S to PARADE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Bailey Holtz
meta.message: Don’t be fooled by the upbeat news coverage: Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade floats have suffered terrible injuries over the years. In the 1997 parade alone, Sonic the Hedgehog’s head was ripped open, the Pink Panther was pierced by a streetlight, and Spiderman’s hands and feet deflated—a particularly poignant torture.
